      • getForwardURI

        public java.lang.String getForwardURI()
        Description copied from interface: IForwardAction
        The URI to go.

        If it starts with "http://" or "https://" the action will forward to the absolute URL in internet (since v4m1), if it starts with "javascript:" the corresponding code will executed by the browser (since 4.0.1), otherwise it will forward to a resource inside this application.

        Specified by:
        getForwardURI in interface IForwardAction
